ComicInfo.Summary: The Boys team up with a local band of resistance fighters who fight for the same goal of freeing prisoners of war. A daring rescue operation puts Peter and the Lost Boys in the crosshairs of the German army while new allies offer a door to a whole new world.
ComicInfo.Tags: Tootles,John Parsons,Michael Darling,France,Wendy Darling,Curly,Peter Pan,Lost Boys,Tiger Lily
ComicInfo.Title: Paris, Part Two
